@graph.name: Zapiet – Pickup + Delivery
@graph.description: A highly versatile Shopify app designed to streamline the delivery and in-store pickup experience for eCommerce merchants with flexible fulfillment options.
featureList: Local delivery zones with zip/postal codes

audience.audienceType: Shopify merchants with local delivery and pickup needs

@graph.name: How to Set Up Zapiet Pickup + Delivery
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to configure Zapiet for your Shopify store

step.name: Install the App
step.text: Install Zapiet from the Shopify App Store and connect it to your store

step.name: Configure Locations
step.text: Set up your pickup locations and delivery zones using zip codes or postal codes

step.name: Set Time Slots
step.text: Create customizable time slots based on your business hours of operation

step.name: Integrate with POS
step.text: Connect with Shopify POS for seamless online and offline order management

step.name: Test Customer Experience
step.text: Verify the delivery date picker and pickup options work correctly for customers

mainEntity.name: What is the starting price for Zapiet?

acceptedAnswer.text: Zapiet offers a tiered pricing model starting at $29.99/month for the basic package.

mainEntity.name: Does Zapiet integrate with Shopify POS?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Zapiet integrates perfectly with Shopify POS, enabling you to manage in-store pickups and deliveries from a single platform.

mainEntity.name: Can I set different delivery zones?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can define local delivery zones using zip codes or postal codes and set different delivery rates based on geographic location.
Zapiet integrates with Google Calendar, Zapier, and various shipping solutions to streamline your workflow.

@graph.name: [REVIEW] Zapiet – Pickup + Delivery
@graph.description: Comprehensive review of Zapiet Pickup + Delivery Shopify app with features, pricing, and integration details

hasDefinedTerm.name: Local Delivery Zones
hasDefinedTerm.description: Geographic areas defined by zip codes or postal codes where delivery services are available with specific rates

hasDefinedTerm.name: Time Slots
hasDefinedTerm.description: Customizable availability windows that allow customers to select specific delivery or pickup times

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify POS Integration
hasDefinedTerm.description: Seamless connection between online store and physical point-of-sale system for unified order management

hasDefinedTerm.name: Real-time Carrier Shipping Rates
hasDefinedTerm.description: Dynamic pricing calculation based on actual shipping carrier rates at checkout
